Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Remove inner static classes in SchemaTypeValidator" (#671) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Remove inner static classes in SchemaTypeValidator" (#671) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Gallery automation updates" (#670) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
I made the following changes:
- Removed YAML metadata from readme
- Updated YAML file with the metadata info

These changes allow us to automatically update the Office gallery (https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/office/gallery) with information for this tool. This means whenever this tool is referenced in the Office Developer Portals, the user will be seeing the most up-to-date information.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Make fields readonly if possible" (#669) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Closed issue "TableRowProperties does not expose child elements as properties" (#627) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Description**

The `TableRowProperties` (`w:trPr`) class does not expose child elements such as `Deleted` (`w:del`) or `Inserted` (`w:ins`) as properties. This is in contrast to the `ParagraphMarkRunProperties` (`w:rPr`) class, for example, which exposes those child elements as properties.

This issue is related to #620, which also points out missing properties.

**Information**

- .NET Target: Any
- DocumentFormat.OpenXml Version: 2.9.1

**Repro**

Look at source code.

**Observed**

Inconsistency in API regarding which child elements it exposes.

**Expected**

API should consistently expose child elements.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Make fields readonly if possible" (#669) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Lazily create XmlPath in ValidationErrorInfo" (#668) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
If any errors are encountered, `ValidationErrorInfo` automatically creates an `Xmlpath` instance. However, this is somewhat expensive to create and may not be used. The validation perf test on master is this:

| Method     | Mean     | Error   | StdDev  | Gen 0     | Allocated |
| ---------- | -------- | ------- | ------- | --------- | --------- |
| Before     | 141.8 ms | 2.75 ms | 2.70 ms | 5000.0000 | 23.72 MB  |
| After      | 138.5 ms | 4.55 ms | 4.68 ms | 4000.0000 | 19.87 MB  |

There's a slight reduction in time, but a large reduction in Gen0 and overall allocations (~17%)
